survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, behaviors, and attitudes towards plant-based dairy alternatives to help businesses tailor their product offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge frequency of consumption.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following plant-based dairy alternatives do you consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Rarely' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular alternatives.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an 'Other' open-text option.
